title: Data Analytics and Business Intelligence
learning_outcomes: Understand key terminology in data analytics and business intelligence
Recognize the value of data analysis skills
Explain the importance of data-driven decision making
Understand data gathering, analysis, and communication steps
Utilize data analytics and business intelligence tools
learning_material: Harvard Business Review (2018). HBR Guide to Data Analytics Basics for Managers

assessment.criteria: Reflection tasks, self-study packages, peer review, assignments
